abstract: Memoir from Republican presidential hopeful Sen Ted Cruz, A Time For Truth, provides new details about insurgent activities of the senator's father; a 1950s Cuban revolutionary, Rafael Cruz had long-held desires to fight alongside Fidel Castro, but is now a pastor who frequently quotes scripture in anti-government speeches to grass-roots groups.
lead_paragraph: In his book, “A Time for Truth,” Senator Cruz of Texas writes of his father, a 1950s Cuban revolutionary who longed to join Mr. Castro’s army.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Recalls How Father Tried to Join Fidel Castro’s Army
headline.print_headline: Cruz Recalls How Father Tried to Join Castro Army

snippet: In his book, “A Time for Truth,” Senator Cruz of Texas writes of his father, a 1950s Cuban revolutionary who longed to join Mr. Castro’s army.
